com.netflix.genie.server.services

Interface PigConfigService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistentPigConfigImpl

    public interface PigConfigService
    Abstraction layer to encapsulate PigConfig functionality.
    Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PigConfigResponse createPigConfig(PigConfigRequest request)
      Create new pig configuration.
      PigConfigResponse deletePigConfig(java.lang.String id)
      Delete a pig configuration from database.

    • Method Detail

      • getPigConfig

        PigConfigResponse getPigConfig(java.lang.String id)
        Gets pig configuration for given id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id for pig configuration to get
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • getPigConfig

        PigConfigResponse getPigConfig(java.lang.String id,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String type)
        Get pig configuration for given filter criteria.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id for pig config (can be null)
        name - name of pig config (can be null)
        type - type of config - possible values: Types.Configuration (can be null)
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • createPigConfig

        PigConfigResponse createPigConfig(PigConfigRequest request)
        Create new pig configuration.
        Parameters:
        request - encapsulates the pig config element to create
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • updatePigConfig

        PigConfigResponse updatePigConfig(PigConfigRequest request)
        Update pig configuration.
        Parameters:
        request - encapsulates the pig config element to upsert, must contain valid id
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code

      • deletePigConfig

        PigConfigResponse deletePigConfig(java.lang.String id)
        Delete a pig configuration from database.
        Parameters:
        id - unique if of pig configuration to delete
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code
